name: Wirewalk()↳ Website
description: Wirewalk()↳ is an adventure where you raid virus-riddled systems for the lols. In the not so distant future, with the advancement of virtual reality and the internet of things, a powerful computer virus capable of infecting any digital system is causing chaos throughout the city. Control Rada, a regular programmer who loves baseball, roller skating and going to the bar. Uninvited, she builds a software called The Wirewalker, capable of hacking any infected digital device at the Wired.
